title: cherry88
author: cherry88
content: 1986-W 1oz Proof Gold Eagle Ultra Cameo PF69 up for auction. 1986 is the first year the US started minting gold coins again since the 1933 Executive Order 6102.This item was purchased from jmbullion about 10 years ago.Additional photos: https://vgy.me/album/HCqz1n7SStarting bid: 0.08BTCMinimum bid increment: 0.001BTCEnd date and time: 7 days (168 hours) from when this is postedSniping protection: any last minute bid extends auction 10 minutesShipping: Continental United States only.  Free USPS priority mail. 3rd Party Insurance via pirateship for extra 0.001BTC. I will record an uncut video of the entire packaging and shipping/drop off process.Escrow: minerjones, OgNasty, krogothmanhattan (I will pay escrow fee)Payment: BitcoinPayment address: 1Fg6SUZMMpwgdJhPrExth2ew5S6CgD3vBWI acknowledge this is a brand new account. However, I am not brand new, just a long-time lurker with coinage to liquidate and a rep to build

comments.author: cherry88
comments.body: Auction ends in less than 24 hours.

comments.author: cherry88
comments.body: Quote from: SaltySpitoon on June 22, 2022, 03:36:16 PM0.081BTC  Looks like this is the winning bid. Congrats.
